message.creategeography.paper_mold.no_fl: The basin is empty. It needs brine.
message.creategeography.paper_mold.wrong: The basin contains the wrong fluid. It needs brine.
message.creategeography.paper_mold.not_e: Not enough brine. Need at least 250 mB.
message.creategeography.paper_mold.succe: Successfully created a brine paper mold.
botania.tagline.exoflame: Ignites Fuelable Machines and speeds up Furnaces
botania.page.exoflame0: Conversely to its $(thing)Generating$(0) counterpart, the $(item)Exoflame$(0) uses $(thing)Mana$(0) to generate heat.$(p)Any $(item)Furnaces$(0) near an active $(item)Exoflame$(0) are fueled and given a speed boost.$(p)$(item)Exoflame$(0) can fueled 9 heated or 1 superheated $(item)Blaze Burners$(0) by default.
